Program Description: $400 rebate for TEP residential customers who purchase and installation of an Energy Star HPWH equipped with a wireless, programmable timer/controller
Equipment Standards Restrictions: new heat pump water heater with a timer/controller, either included with the unit or purchased and installed separately in this calendar year; timer/controller must be connected to Wi-Fi with a strong signal strength; Program the timer/controller to not operate during on-peak hours of 3–7 p.m
Contractor Restrictions: must be installed by a licensed installer, who must provide proof that the work was properly permitted
Other Restrictions: product must be purchased from a local retailer, the TEP Marketplace or an online retailer, not to include eBay or other resale sites, that ships the item to the customer’s service address in TEP’s territory; Allow a TEP representative to visit and enter your property to verify program requirements are met
